message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this amazing product for a special price of $11,000. I think it's a great deal, and I'm confident you'll love it!
Hi Alice, thanks for the offer! I'm really interested, but $11,000 is a little outside my budget. Would you be willing to go down to $9,500? That's my absolute maximum.

Hi Bob, thanks for your offer! I understand your budget constraints, but I'm still a bit above your maximum. How about we meet in the middle at $10,200? I think it's a fair compromise and will still give you a great deal on this amazing product!
